name: Truetime-hsf
tagline: This is an extended version of TrueTime which two level hierarchical scheduler
body:
TrueTime-HSF is a simulation environment for simulating the behavior hierarchical real-time systems. This simulator is used in the following publications:
1. [Bandwidth Adaptation in Hierarchical Scheduling Using Fuzzy Controllers](http://www.es.mdh.se/publications/2375-Bandwidth_Adaptation_in_Hierarchical_Scheduling_Using_Fuzzy_Controllers)
2.[Adaptive Hierarchical Scheduling Framework: Configuration and Evaluation](http://www.es.mdh.se/publications/2949-Adaptive_Hierarchical_Scheduling_Framework__Configuration_and_Evaluation)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
